question:
The Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change (MoEFCC) has framed a new draft Coastal Regulation Zone (CRZ) Notification, 2018. The new draft proposes to:
  1. reduce the Coastal Regulation Zone limit to 50 meters from the current limit of 100 meters
  2. establish a No Development Zone (NDZ) of 20 meters along islands
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
The salient features of the draft CRZ Notification, 2018: The High Tide Line (HTL) has been demarcated by the National Centre for Sustainable Coastal Management (NCSCM)
  • Hazard line mapping has also been carried out by Survey of India.
  • CRZ limits to be reduced from 100 meters to 50 meters
  • A No Development Zone (NDZ) of 20 meters has been proposed along all Islands
